hero.h1: Saleshandy Review 2026: Cold Email at Scale for a Fraction of the Cost

quickSummary.whatItDoes: Cold email outreach platform with unlimited email accounts, automated multi-step sequences, email warm-up, and basic lead prospecting.
quickSummary.bestFor: Agencies, founders, and SDRs who need to send high volumes of cold email at the lowest possible cost per seat.
quickSummary.pricing: From $36/month for 6,000 prospects. Unlimited email accounts on all plans.

paragraphs: Saleshandy is a cold email outreach platform built around one core value proposition: unlimited email accounts at a flat monthly price. Where Instantly and Smartlead charge per mailbox or per sending account, Saleshandy includes unlimited connected email accounts on every plan — making it the default choice for agencies managing multiple client domains and founders who want to rotate across many inboxes without a per-seat penalty.

The platform covers the full cold email workflow: lead prospecting via its built-in B2B database (200M+ contacts), multi-step email sequences with conditional branching, email warm-up to protect deliverability, and a unified inbox for managing replies across all connected accounts. It does not have a native dialer, LinkedIn automation, or advanced CRM functionality — it is a focused cold email tool, not a full sales engagement platform.

Saleshandy competes directly with Instantly.ai and Smartlead.ai in the cold email category. Its differentiation is price and the unlimited accounts model. Its weakness relative to both competitors is a less polished UI and a smaller community of power users sharing templates and best practices.

features.title: Unlimited Email Accounts
features.description: Connect as many sending accounts as you need on every plan. No per-mailbox fees. Critical for agencies managing multiple client domains or anyone using inbox rotation to protect deliverability.

features.title: Multi-Step Sequences with Conditions
features.description: Build automated follow-up sequences with conditional branching — send different emails based on whether a prospect opened, clicked, or replied. Supports A/Z testing across up to 26 variants.

features.title: Email Warm-Up (Built-In)
features.description: Automated warm-up network included on all plans. Gradually increases sending volume and simulates real engagement to protect sender reputation before launching campaigns.

features.title: B2B Lead Database
features.description: Access to 700M+ contacts (200M+ verified emails) for prospecting without a separate data tool. Included credits vary by plan; useful for SMB prospecting but not a replacement for ZoomInfo or Apollo at enterprise scale.

features.title: Unified Inbox
features.description: Manage replies from all connected email accounts in a single interface. Tag, filter, and respond without switching between inboxes. Supports team collaboration on reply management.

features.title: Deliverability Tools
features.description: Spam test before sending, email verification to reduce bounce rates, and sending throttles to stay within provider limits. Basic but covers the essentials for maintaining inbox placement.

pricing.note: Pricing as of February 2026. All plans include unlimited email accounts.
pricing.creditNote: All plans include a 14-day free trial. Annual billing saves ~20%. Prospect limits reset monthly.

g2Reviews.intro: Based on 650+ reviews on G2 (4.6/5 rating):

pros.text: Reviewers consistently cite the unlimited email accounts as the primary reason for choosing Saleshandy over Instantly or Smartlead.
Users report strong inbox placement rates when following the warm-up protocol, with several noting 60–70% open rates on well-targeted campaigns.
Agency users highlight the cost advantage of managing 20+ client domains on a single plan without per-account fees.

cons.text: Multiple reviewers note that Instantly and Smartlead have cleaner interfaces and better UX for campaign management.
Fewer public templates, YouTube tutorials, and community resources compared to Instantly's large user base.
The built-in B2B database is useful for basic prospecting but reviewers note lower accuracy compared to Apollo or ZoomInfo for enterprise contacts.

goodFit.heading: Saleshandy is a strong fit for:
items: Agencies managing cold email for multiple clients on separate domains — the unlimited accounts model eliminates per-client mailbox costs
Founders and solo operators who want a full cold email stack (warm-up, sequences, database) at the lowest possible price
SDRs at SMBs who need to run high-volume outbound without a $500+/month tool budget
Teams already using a separate CRM who just need a reliable cold email execution layer

notAFit.heading: Saleshandy is not the right choice if:
items: You need a dialer, LinkedIn automation, or full sales engagement platform — Saleshandy is cold email only
You want the best-in-class UI and community resources — Instantly has a larger ecosystem of templates and tutorials
Your prospecting requires enterprise-grade data accuracy — the built-in database is useful but not a replacement for Apollo or ZoomInfo
You need Salesforce or HubSpot native sync — integrations are available but less mature than Outreach or Salesloft

verdict.bestFor: Agencies and high-volume cold email senders who need unlimited accounts at the lowest cost per seat
verdict.avoidIf: You need a dialer, LinkedIn automation, or enterprise-grade data enrichment
verdict.bottomLine: Saleshandy wins on price-per-account for agencies and founders. If you are managing multiple client domains or rotating across 10+ inboxes, it is the most cost-effective cold email platform available. If you want the best UI or the largest community, Instantly is the better choice.

org.explain: Strong for SMB and agency outbound. Limited CRM integration and no dialer reduces enterprise fit.

individual.explain: Good for high-volume cold email senders. Less polished UX than Instantly reduces individual rep productivity.

decisionSnapshot.intro: Six-dimension assessment based on public review data, vendor documentation, and community feedback.

rows.notes: Built-in warm-up and spam testing produce strong inbox placement when used correctly.

evidence.text: Multiple users report 60–70% open rates on well-targeted campaigns after warm-up period.

rows.notes: Conditional branching and A/Z testing are strong. Less intuitive to configure than Instantly.

evidence.text: Reviewers praise the 26-variant A/Z testing but note the sequence builder has a steeper learning curve.

rows.notes: Unlimited email accounts on all plans is the best pricing model in the cold email category for agencies.

evidence.text: Agency users consistently cite cost savings of 40–60% vs per-mailbox competitors.

rows.notes: Functional but less polished than Instantly. Onboarding takes 1–2 days for new users.

evidence.text: Several reviewers note the UI is 'not as clean as Instantly' but 'gets the job done'.

rows.notes: Native CRM integrations available but less mature. Zapier covers most gaps.

evidence.text: Native integrations with HubSpot, Pipedrive, Zoho. Salesforce via Zapier only.

rows.notes: Live chat support on all plans. Response times generally under 4 hours per G2 reviewers.

evidence.text: Support rated positively by most reviewers; occasional delays noted on complex technical issues.

evidenceSignals.confidenceNote: Assessment based on 650+ G2 reviews, Capterra reviews, and vendor documentation. No direct product testing.
strengthThemes: Unlimited email accounts on all plans
limitationThemes: Smaller community and fewer public resources

whereItBreaks: At enterprise scale, the built-in B2B database is insufficient — you will need Apollo or ZoomInfo for accurate contact data
If your team needs a dialer or LinkedIn outreach, Saleshandy cannot replace a full sales engagement platform
The sequence builder becomes unwieldy for very complex multi-branch campaigns — Smartlead's AI branching handles this better

replaces: Instantly (if you need unlimited accounts at lower cost)

alternatives.name: Instantly
alternatives.reason: Better UI and larger community; similar pricing

alternatives.name: Smartlead
alternatives.reason: Better AI branching and deliverability tools

finalCta.heading: Ready to Try Saleshandy?
finalCta.body: 14-day free trial. No credit card required. Connect unlimited email accounts and launch your first sequence in under an hour.
